content:
Manage Goals

You can create, edit, and delete goals from the Dialogs page or the Goals page of the Bot Builder. On the Dialogs page, goals appear as a Goal dialog step. You can’t make changes to goals when your bot is active.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Einstein Bots is available in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience. Setup for Einstein Bots is available in Lightning Experience.
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To build and manage Einstein Bots:	

Customize Application

OR

Modify Metadata

OR

Manage Bots

Create or Add a Goal from the Goals Page
Create a goal and choose whether to add it to a dialog now or later.
Enter a goal name that’s unique to your bot using letters, numbers, and underscores only. This name identifies your goal in reports.

To add an existing goal to a dialog from the Goals page, edit the goal. To add an existing goal to a dialog from the Dialogs page, add the Goal dialog step to a dialog.

On the Dialogs page, you can move your goal to a different location in your dialog by dragging the Goal dialog step.

Create or Add a Goal from the Dialogs Page
From the Dialog Component Library, drag the Goal dialog step onto the canvas to the location you want in the dialog.
In the Step Properties panel, in the Goal Name field, select or create a goal. This field shows only goals that aren’t associated with another dialog.

Edit or Delete a Goal

To delete a goal, from the Goals page, delete the goal from the Bot Goals list.

When you delete the Goal dialog step from a dialog on the Dialogs page, you remove the Goal from the dialog, but the goal persists in the Bot Goals list. You can delete the goal from the Goals page or add it to a different dialog.
title: Managing Einstein Bots Goals
